Saunders James Subject EnronMethanol Plant Outage Paul The Methanol Plant was shutdown during August of this year due to poor economics The following is a list of steps taken to prepare the plant for this outage Lines and vessels have been purged and are mostly open to the atmosphere Lubricating oils have been drained from equipment large oil systems eg syn gas and recycle compressor lube systems
